name: MeoWizard
description:
With the witch away from home, the restless cats can't help playing wizards, messing around with explosive potions, and burning cardboard boxes. Burning one another is not out of the picture either.

MeoWizard is a passion project that is heavily inspired by the Bomberman series by Hudson Soft (and later on Konami).

CONTROLS:

P1:

  • Move: WASD
  • Plant potion: L

P2:

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Plant potion: NumPad 3

P3 & P4:

  • Move: Gamepad D-pad
  • Plant potion: East button (B on Xbox controller)
  • You can only play with P3 and P4 if there are controllers connected. Otherwise, the game would freeze.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Sometimes players can become stuck between 2 tiles after planting potions. Happens more often while players are on fire (higher speed)

CREDITS:
